title: The Work-From-Home Draft, Tua Breakdowns, and Hosting a President With Mike Tannenbaum | The Ringer NFL Show
description:
On this special Thursday episode, Kevin is joined by former Jets and Dolphins executive and current ESPN analyst, Mike Tannenbaum, to talk about the NFL draft and how that could work in the era of working from home. They also discuss the possibilities for Tua Tagovailoa, as well as what the NFL may look like in the future.
Hosts: Kevin Clark
Guest: Mike Tannenbaum

      
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
